title: Modified the edit setting stage to make it clear which item is being edited, by…
message:
Modified the edit setting stage to make it clear which item is being edited, by adding a the servo wipe between the edit motor time and the edit DT time.
Added a power down state when 30 seconds of inactivity has passed after DT. This power down state might save some power and will cause most ESCs to beep reminding the user to disconnect the battery.
